title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Zurich, Switzerland
description:
For the fourth time, we're glad to be part of GDCR in Zurich! 
Our hosts, as per tradition, are the friendliest and coolest IT shop in town: Namics AG (http://www.namics.com/namics/standorte/zuerich/). 
Registrations open mid-October - put yourselves on the mailing list at Coders Only | Zurich (http://zurich.codersonly.org/events/code-retreat/). 
Also, check out the GDCR events in Bern and St. Gallen as well, you may need to travel less!
